T02D2524:138a-1: k'a ru no da ya n'a ma bh'a ba rdza ba bidhi:/
T02D2524:138a-3: thugs rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba bsgom pa dang
T02D2524:138a-4: bzlas pa'i cho ga ; bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam

T02D2524:138a-12: snying rjes byams chos slob dpon ye shes rdo rje gzhan yang pad dkar zhes bya bas //

T02D2524:138a-14: de la dang por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

T02D2524:138b-8: kha shar ram nub tu lta ba'am /
T02D2524:138b-9: ji ltar dga' bar bltas te /

T02D2524:138b-29: sa bon gyi yi ge rnam par dgod par bya

T02D2524:138b-35: lag pa g-yon pa la yang de bzhin du dgod do //
T02D2524:138b-36: de nas lag pa g-yas par gnas pa rnams ni

T02D2524:139a-0: de nas sor mo de rnams @139a * //

T02D2524:139a-18: phyag rgya'o // gzhag la / aom badzri bha ba h'um zhes kyang brjod do //
T02D2524:139a-19: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i yi

T02D2524:139a-28: lte ba yan chad rdo rje h'um mdzad lta bu la /

T02D2524:139a-30: kun du 'bigs par bsams la kun nas kyang 'jig
T02D2524:139a-31: pa'i dus kyi me 'bar ba lta bus khebs par
T02D2524:139a-32: gyur pa'i gnas kyi sa la zhugs par gyur par
T02D2524:139a-33: bsams nas / aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya /
T02D2524:139a-34: sarba bighnan bandha h'um phat ces kyang brjod la /
T02D2524:139a-35: rdo rje 'bar ba rnams kyis gdug pa rnams rab

T02D2524:139a-39: mo // dang ldan zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams

T02D2524:139b-0: dkyil 'khor chen po bsam par @139b bya'o ;

T02D2524:139b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig blang bar bya ste /
T02D2524:139b-3: rang gi lus yi ge mam dmar po tsam du bsams la /
T02D2524:139b-4: de nyid 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug bar bsams te /
T02D2524:139b-5: steng gi rtsibs gnyis ni mgo bo //

T02D2524:139b-8: yang ngos gnyis kyi rtsibs gnyis ni brlab dang byin pa gnyis so //

T02D2524:139b-10: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'khor lo'i sku

T02D2524:139b-16: bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i de

T02D2524:139b-18: rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor

T02D2524:140a-2: phra mo la ni nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o //

T02D2524:140a-14: phyogs su kun du gnas pa de'i tshe yi ge

T02D2524:140a-16: mi dge ba ma lus pa'i gzugs sha za'i lus
T02D2524:140a-17: can gdong rnam par 'gyur ba sha med pa skra

T02D2524:140a-27: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i bsod
T02D2524:140a-28: nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su 'bar bar gyur ba'i
T02D2524:140a-29: 'bar ba'i me'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su bsam

T02D2524:140a-31: lte ba'i dbus su rdo rje gnod sbyin dang 'dra
T02D2524:140a-32: ba g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa dang /
T02D2524:140a-33: sna rtse'i gnas su gnas pa'i rdo rje phra mo
T02D2524:140a-34: 'bar bar gyur cing me 'bar ba'i nang du chud
T02D2524:140a-35: pa'i lcags kyi gong bu lta bu /

T02D2524:140a-41: g-yas pa'i dpung pa bteg nas khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin pa /
T02D2524:140a-42: khro gnyer bsnyer ba'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D2524:140b-0: badzra mu: zhes bya @140b bas phyung la /
T02D2524:140b-2: sdig pa'i lus skad cig gis 'jigs shing rab tu 'dar ba dang /
T02D2524:140b-4: rgya mtsho chen por lhung bar gyur la kun du

T02D2524:140b-30: dang bcas pas ngan 'gro'i 'gro bar gtogs pa'i sems

T02D2524:141a-19: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bo dang mthe'u chung sbyar te /

T02D2524:141a-23: sngags kyi mthar snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //

T02D2524:146a-0: ngo bo mi g-yo ba'i ting @146a * //
T02D2524:146a-1: nge 'dzin gyi mthus brtan par gyur pa nam mkha'i

T02D2524:152b-0: @152b rdo rje se gol gyi phyag rgya bcings la /

T02D2524:153a-0: @153a * // sems dpa' 'byung ba de nyid don //
